♻️ We help you to reduce your Carbon footprint.

🔥 Diesel + Electric Hybrid Material Handler: 

•	Booms are made of SSAB Strenx 700 material for extra durability
•	Solid Rubber Tire
•	Quick change from Diesel to Electric Power
•	14 m Boom Reach 3,5 tons lifting force at max reach
•	Bosch Rexroth hydraulics
•	175 HP Volvo Diesel Engine
•	90 kW Electric Motor
•	Easy change from Electric Power to Diesel
•	We help you to reduce your Carbon footprint.

The Diesel + Electric Hybrid Material Handler is an impressive product that boasts a number of exceptional features. Its booms are constructed of SSAB Strenx 700 material, ensuring extra durability. Equipped with solid rubber tires, this material handler allows for a quick and easy transition from diesel to electric power. With a 14-meter boom reach and a 3.5-ton lifting force at maximum reach, it offers powerful performance for a variety of applications. It comes with Bosch Rexroth hydraulics, 175 horsepower Volvo diesel engine, and 90 kW electric motor. Users can easily switch between electric power and diesel power, making it a flexible solution for different job sites. Additionally, by using this product, you can reduce your carbon footprint, as we help you to make environmentally conscious choices.

➤ About Hybrid Material Handler: https://lnkd.in/dC4ztXBz
➤ All Material Handler: https://lnkd.in/dWf-qx2D
➤ Web Site: https://lnkd.in/dmZmCsMi

---

♻️ Karbon Ayak izinizi düşürmenize yardımcı oluyoruz. 

🔥 Dizel + Elektrikli Hibrit Elleçleme Vinci Özellikleri: 

•	Bomlar ekstra dayanıklılık için SSAB Strenx 700 malzemeden yapılmıştır 
•	Dizelden Elektrik gücüne hızlı ve kolay geçiş  
•	14 m Boom boyu, maksimum uzanmada 3,5 ton kaldırma kuvveti  
•	Bosch Rexroth pompa ve valfi
•	175 HP Volvo Dizel Motor
•	90 kW elektrik motor 
•	Elektrik gücünden dizele kolay geçiş
•	Karbon ayak izinizi düşürmenize yardımcı oluyoruz. 

Dizel + Elektrikli Hibrit Elleçleme Vinci, üstün dayanıklılık için SSAB Strenx 700 malzeme ile tasarlanmış bomlara sahip bir üründür. Bu elleçleme vinci, dolgu lastiklerle donatılmıştır ve hızlı bir şekilde dizel güçten elektrik gücüne geçiş yapabilme özelliğine sahiptir. 14 metrelik bom boyu ve maksimum uzanmada 3,5 ton kaldırma kapasitesi ile güçlü bir performans sunar. Bosch Rexroth pompa ve valf sistemleri ile donatılmıştır. 175 beygir gücündeki Volvo dizel motoruyla çalışırken, değiştirir 90 kilovatlık elektrik motoru da kullanılabilir. Elektrik gücünden dizel güce kolayca geçiş yapabilme özelliği sayesinde kullanıcıların karbon ayak izini azaltmalarına yardımcı olur. Dizel + Elektrikli Hibrit Elleçleme Vinci, dayanıklılığı, performansı ve çevre dostu özellikleriyle dikkat çekmektedir.

➤ Hibrid Hurda Vinci Hakkında Ayrıntılı Bilgi: https://lnkd.in/dfHAnGb4
➤ Tüm Metal Hurda Vinçleri: https://lnkd.in/dR_YjNhn
➤ Web Site: https://lnkd.in/dmZmCsMi

Piranha shears are designed to efficiently process metal scrap with high cutting capacity and durability.

⚙️ Working Principle: 

Piranha increases the density of all types of scrap by compressing it and then automatically cuts it into the desired lengths. Diesel and electric power options are available. It has a production capacity range from 6 to 60 tons per hour depending on the model. Thanks to the short stroke programme, the blades only rise up to the height of the scrap, reducing cutting time and increasing capacity.

➤ Detailed information about Pıranha: https://lnkd.in/dn-eeG2n
➤ All Metal Scrap Shears: https://lnkd.in/dq423CXY
➤ Web Site: birimrecycling.com/

---

Metal geri dönüşümündeki en büyük yardımcınız olan Piranha makası, yüksek kesme kapasitesi ve dayanıklılığı ile metal hurdaları verimli bir şekilde işlemek için tasarlanmıştır.

⚙️ Çalışma Prensibi: 

Piranha,her cins hurdayı sıkıştırarak yoğunluğunu artırır ve ardından istenilen uzunluklarda otomatik olarak keser. Dizel ve elektrikli güç seçenekleri mevcuttur. Modele bağlı olarak saatte 6 ila 60 ton arasında değişen üretim kapasitesine sahiptir. Kısa strok programı sayesinde bıçaklar yalnızca hurda yüksekliği kadar kalkarak kesim süresini azaltır ve kapasiteyi artırır. 

➤ Piranha Hakkında Ayrıntılı Bilgi: birimrecycling.com/piranha
➤ Tüm Metal Hurda Makasları: https://lnkd.in/dy9K9ues

ORCA | Reliable Performance In Harsh Conditions

- Strong body for Heavy Duty operation
- High quality heavy duty cylinders (Hardened and chrome-coated piston rots, honed pipes)
- The best quality brands are used in hydraulic and electronic parts: Linde, Rexroth, Siemens, Telemecanique, Phoenix Contact
- Original Hardox anti-wear plates

----

ORCA | Zorlu Koşullarda Güvenilir Performans

- Ağır hizmete uygun güçlü gövde 
- Yüksek kaliteli ağır hizmet silindirleri (Sertleştirilmiş ve krom kaplanmış miller ,özel honlanmış borular)

Customer Advisory Board 
Day 2 recap

The second and final day of LINDEMANN’s Customer Advisory Board built on the momentum of an incredible first day, with deeper discussions, industry-leading insights, and an exclusive look at cutting-edge recycling technology in action. Steel industry expert Dr. Christian Fröhling from SMS took centre stage with a keynote exploring the role of electric arc furnaces, regulatory pressures, and the role recycled steel/scrap will play in the developing global demand for green steel.🌱

His insights reinforced the industry’s need for improved density and purity – as well as innovation, collaboration and a strong commitment to decarbonization.
Attendees then had the unique opportunity to tour S. Norton Group’s advanced recycling facility, featuring the world’s first LINDEMANN shredder with the revolutionary Variable Frequency Drive (VDA) technology, as well as Shredder Drive Assist (SDA). Seeing innovation in action capped off an event that was not just about discussion — but about real solutions and a better way forward for the industry.♻️

From thought-provoking keynotes to hands-on experiences, LINDEMANN’s Customer Advisory Board was a milestone moment for the industry. This event underscored the power of partnership in shaping a stronger, more sustainable future for metal recycling.

🎥 Watch the video to see the highlights from Day 2!

First Customer Advisory Board of Metal Recycling Industry successfully 
held in Manchester

Day 1 recap

Industry leaders, innovators, and decision-makers from across the global metal recycling sector gathered at the historic Midland Hotel in Manchester, England for LINDEMANN’s inaugural Customer Advisory Board (CAB). Over two days, delegates from all over Europe – and as far afield as Canada – discussed the future of metal recycling, emerging trends, challenges, and how the industry can drive meaningful change.

Following an opening address by LINDEMANN CEO Carl Gustaf Göransson, Past President of the Bureau of International Recycling, Tom Bird, delivered a powerful keynote, emphasizing that while the industry is already green, it must do more to communicate its sustainability credentials. This set the stage for insightful presentations from LINDEMANN’s leadership team, outlining the company’s strategic vision, advancements in technology and a commitment to supporting customers with new business models and closer after-sales partnerships. 📣🤝

But CAB wasn’t just about presentations — it was a collaborative platform where industry voices were heard. Lively discussions and interactive sessions captured key challenges and opportunities, ensuring that customer perspectives are at the heart of future innovations. Participants even got to go toe-to-toe with the professional table tennis athletes from the LINDEMANN-sponsored Borussia Düsseldorf e.V. team in Germany!

📽️ Watch the video to relive the energy, insights, and collaboration from Day 1!

InDEx: Revolutionizing Metal Recycling Technology ♻️

The circular economy demands high performance and rapid, predictive recycling technologies to meet its ambitious goals. That’s where InDEx, LINDEMANN’s digital operating and production data acquisition system, comes in.

Developed to provide real-time insights into your machine’s performance, InDEx empowers operators to:

📈Monitor utilization and performance instantly

🔍 Track materials being processed

📲 Access critical data anytime, anywhere—via mobile app or web portal

In a presentation at RWTH Aachen University, experts Wei Song, Fabian Diaz, and Bernd Friedrich recognized InDEx as a “state-in-industry” solution, highlighting its role in supporting the circular economy through digital transformation.

InDEx gives our customers the tools they need to stay agile and efficient, making it easier than ever to optimize processes and maximize machine value. Together, we’re setting new standards in metal recycling technology.

Excellent Service for Customers Success😎💪CASE STUDY - EXCELLENT CUSTOMER-RELATIONSHIP AND CUSTOMER-SERVICE ACROSS CONTINENTS

Sometimes it's not the big strategies or long-term plans that make the difference - but quick, pragmatic solutions at critical moments.

One of our customers had a machine failure: A control block had unexpectedly failed after very long time of operation. Replacement? It had already been ordered before the failure, but was still in production for some time. Long story short: machine downtime and loss of production.

In this situation our service team deeply impressed me:
Instead of waiting, they checked with another long-standing customer, who they knew had a machine of the same type and a control block in stock.

The result? We picked this one up and sent it to another customer - a temporary loan of the control block across continents!

I have been working in various industries for over 15 years. But I've never experienced this kind of interaction between service and customers!

What can we learn from this?
✅ Excellent service - does not just mean reacting to problems, but finding solutions where others only see obstacles.
✅ Good customer relations - a genuine partnership-based exchange is what makes such solutions conceivable. Trust and long-term cooperation pay off - for all sides.

Have you ever experienced similarly situations? Even in other fields?CASE STUDY - EXCELLENT CUSTOMER-RELATIONSHIP AND CUSTOMER-SERVICE ACROSS CONTINENTS

At the 12th International Material Recycling Convention & Exposition,
held by MRAI, LINDEMANN  made a significant impact, joining 2,500 delegates from around the world. 🌍✨ Keegan Vas represented the company in a high-profile panel discussion on the role of technology in scrap processing. He showcased innovative solutions, including the Index and the groundbreaking thermal camera for shredders. 🔥🤖

The panel, featuring experts from different branches, sparked lively debates on AI-driven sorting, sensor-based separation, and advanced processing techniques. These discussions set new standards for productivity, sustainability, and the future of the recycling industry. ♻️🚀

LINDEMANN's booth at the exhibition was buzzing with activity, further reinforcing the company's commitment to pushing the boundaries of metal recycling. The future of the industry looks bright! 💡

Designed for ultimate operator comfort and precision, the LINDEMANN shredder cabin sets the standard for modern recycling equipment.

✅ Climate Control: Equipped with heating and air-conditioning, the cabin provides optimal comfort in all weather conditions.

✅ Enhanced Monitoring: An advanced graphic visualization system with Siemens TP series ensures seamless machine monitoring, so operators can stay in control.

✅ Ergonomic Excellence: The rotating control chair, with adjustable length and height, features dampers for smoother operation. Separate replacement options for seat cushions, armrests, and headrests mean longer-lasting comfort.

✅ Optimal Visibility: Angled and reinforced safety glass minimizes reflections, providing an unobstructed view of the worksite.

✅ Intuitive Controls: Joysticks and push buttons are integrated into the armrests for effortless operation, while the adjustable side-wall-mounted control panel puts everything within reach.

Built with comfort, safety, and efficiency in mind. Stay tuned for more insights into our machine features!

Location Spotlight: San Antonio, Texas! 🇺🇸

At LINDEMANN Metal Recycling, we take pride in being close to our customers, no matter where they are. Today, we're highlighting our North American headquarters in the vibrant city of San Antonio, Texas! 🤠

This dynamic hub is where X incredible team members come together to drive innovation and provide exceptional service. It’s also home to our U.S. service center, which ensures top-notch support for our North American customers. 

But what makes San Antonio so special?

🌵 Known as the "Alamo City", San Antonio boasts a rich history, with landmarks like the iconic Alamo and the San Antonio Missions, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

🌉 The city is famous for the beautiful River Walk, a network of scenic walkways along the San Antonio River filled with restaurants, shops, and cultural experiences.

🎉 San Antonio is also a hub for innovation and business, making it the perfect home for LINDEMANN’s commitment to advancing metal recycling technology in North America.

From this dynamic location, we work to deliver cutting-edge recycling solutions and industry-leading support to our customers across the continent.

🇮🇳 India’s Steel Ambitions: A Call for Action in Metal Recycling♻️

By 2030, India aims to achieve an impressive 250 million tones of steel output, a critical milestone for its industrial and economic growth. But this ambitious target comes with a significant challenge: 700 shredder plants will be required to process the necessary scrap materials, supported by 2,800-3,000 collection and dismantling centers.(Source: Euromonitor, SIAM, Business Sweden Analysis)

This is a tremendous opportunity for the recycling industry to step up and play a pivotal role in building a more efficient and sustainable supply chain.

At LINDEMANN, we are committed to driving innovation and delivering advanced solutions that empower businesses to meet these demands. With our cutting-edge shredders and expertise in metal recycling, we’re ready to support India—and the world—on its journey to a more circular economy.

Let’s shape the future of recycling together. 🌟

♻️ The future of steel is circular.
 
Today, around 30% of steel is produced using recycled scrap. By 2050, this share is expected to rise to 50%—a major shift toward a more resource-efficient and lower-emission industry.
 
At LINDEMANN, we are proud to provide the technology that powers this transformation. Our high-performance shredders and shears help the industry recover more material, optimize processing, and meet the growing demand for recycled steel.
 
Steel’s strength lies not just in its durability but in its infinite recyclability. Let's shape a cleaner future together.🌱
 
Source: ING Think: Why ferrous scrap is emerging as a key strategic raw material

Vergangene Woche hieß es wieder: "Shooting time!" 📸 📹 Gemeinsam mit Ben Ott haben wir die heiligen Hallen von LINDEMANN betreten und den Jungs aus dem Service- und Repaircenter bei ihrer Arbeit über die Schulter geblickt. 

Beeindruckend: die Schrottpresse, die hier im Video zu sehen ist, wiegt um die 40 Tonnen und schafft es binnen 26 Sekunden aus Stanzabfällen ein 40 x 40 cm großes "Bale" zum pressen, das dann ca. 300kg wiegt und wieder eingeschmolzen wird. Nestled in the industrial landscape of Düsseldorf,
Germany, LINDEMANN Metal Recycling‘s 8,000 m2 servicenter is one of the best of its kind. For 15 years, this
facility has been at the forefront of revolutionizing the
repair and refurbishment of a range of rotors and other
components. Each component undergoes a rigorous
failure analysis process to ensure it meets or exceeds
original specifications.
Behind the scenes, a dedicated team of more than
20 experts, service technicians, and engineers work
tirelessly with state-of-the-art machinery to uphold
LINDEMANN‘s reputation. Their collective expertise and
commitment to customer satisfaction are the driving
forces behind the Service Center‘s success, enabling
LINDEMANN to consistently deliver outstanding results
to its customers.

✅ And the EtaPress 44, which you can see in the video here, was fully manufactured and installed in our service center – including mechanics, electrics, and hydraulics.

Safety First Hearing Protection

🔊 Customized Hearing Protection for a Safer Workplace! 🔊

At LINDEMANN, the safety and well-being of our team are top priorities. That's why we introduced customized hearing protection – Ortoplastik – designed specifically for our team members as part of our commitment to workplace safety.

Why is Ortoplastik special?
✔️ Modular & Flexible: The earJack adapter ensures seamless communication in noisy environments by connecting to communication systems.
✔️ Custom Fit: On-site ear impressions provide maximum comfort and efficiency.
✔️ Enhanced Safety: Seal testing guarantees optimal noise protection.

We’ve been using Ortoplastik for years, and it was recently renewed to maintain the highest protection standards. To ensure continued effectiveness, it's recommended to check the fit every 3–4 years due to changes in the ear canal.

With Ortoplastik, we combine top-tier hearing protection with practical communication—showing that safety and efficiency go hand-in-hand. 🦻💡

We’ve been using Ortoplastik for years, and it was recently renewed to maintain the highest protection standards. To ensure continued effectiveness, it's recommended to check the fit every 3–4 years due to changes in the ear canal.

With Ortoplastik, we combine top-tier hearing protection with practical communication—showing that safety and efficiency go hand-in-hand. 🦻💡

We create the means to turn Old into New. Unloved into Wanted. Uneconomic into Lucrative. ♻️

We Hate Waste 🚫
That’s why we have dedicated our lives to turning scrap metal into value. 
Since the turn of the last century, we have combined a talent for innovation with our unrivalled reputation for engineering expertise. 🛠️

Our products do the heavy lifting of transforming the gigatonnes of scrap metal society discards annually into the raw materials for reinvention. 

Our customers use our products and services to process nearly 200 million tons of scrap metal annually. That’s enough new metal to build a mind-bending quarter-of-a-billion new cars – or nearly 3,500 Titanic-sized ocean liners 🚢. Every year.

Our customers are the vital engine of the global circular metal economy 🔄. We are honoured to play a small part in helping them thrive and succeed. Because when they do well, society does well. 💪

Lindemann is the world oldest metal recycling company. But far from being redundant, the world needs our skills more than ever. 🌍
Society is using up the earth’s resources at an unsustainable rate. 🌱

The World needs our skills more than ever. It needs Transformers. 🔄

🇧🇷 Spotlight on Sorocaba! 🌟

Did you know that Sorocaba, Brazil, isn’t just famous for its industrial strength but also for its hot climate and even hotter metal recycling solutions? 🔥♻️

At LINDEMANN, our Sorocaba Service Centre is the beating heart of our South American operations, keeping machines running smoothly and customers happy. With an expert team of 6 passionate professionals, we deliver top-tier service and support across the region.

But here’s what makes Sorocaba extra special:
🌿 Green spaces everywhere – with over 100 parks and ecological reserves
🚂 Rich history – once a key stop on Brazil’s old railway system, connecting São Paulo to the interior
⚽ Football fever – home to São Bento FC, a club with passionate local supporters
🥖 Famous for pão de queijo! – because no visit to Sorocaba is complete without Brazil’s iconic cheese bread

Our team here doesn’t just fix machines but they power the future of sustainable metal recycling with innovation, dedication, and a touch of Brazilian flair! 🎉

Got a LINDEMANN machine that needs some TLC? Our Sorocaba crew has your back. 💪

Happy International Day of Zero Waste! 
 
At LINDEMANN Metal Recycling, we’re proud to champion sustainable practices that turn what many see as waste into valuable resources. Today, we celebrate our commitment to a circular economy—reducing environmental impact while driving innovation in metal recycling.♻️
 
Our work goes beyond processing scrap metal; it’s about creating a legacy of conservation, efficiency, and responsibility. By transforming materials that would otherwise end up in landfills, we contribute to a cleaner, more sustainable future for all.
 
Join us in embracing the zero waste philosophy: 
✅ Reduce waste at its source. 
✅ Reuse and recycle materials. 
✅ Reinvent the way we think about resources.
 
Let’s collaborate and innovate to pave the way towards a world where nothing is wasted. Share your thoughts on sustainability and zero waste, and together, let’s make a lasting impact.

🌍 Why Metal Recycling Matters 🌍

Did you know that recycling metals can save up to 95% of the energy needed to produce new metal? 🌱💡 At LINDEMANN Metal Recycling, we’re proud to contribute to a more sustainable future by reducing CO2 emissions and conserving valuable natural resources — every single day.

Why is metal recycling so important?
✔️ Energy Savings: Recycling metals uses far less energy than producing new ones.
✔️ Lower CO2 Emissions: Less energy-intensive processes reduce carbon emissions.
✔️ Resource Conservation: Recycling helps preserve finite resources like steel, aluminum, and copper.

At LINDEMANN, we’re committed to making the most out of every material, turning waste into valuable resources, and contributing to a cleaner, greener planet. 
Together, we can make a difference! 🌱

This is what it’s all about! Our industry may be vital to everyday life, but it’s the people, friendships, and shared experiences that give it heart. Grateful to be part of a community that lifts each other up. Cheers, 🧿 Atilla W.! All my insecurities laid bare...

Believe it or not 

I'm not a big fan of my appearance or how I sound

I cringe when I see and hear myself in TV interviews or recordings

Unfortunately, the career & life I choose means I drive myself to be ultra visible

That means jumping head first into any speaking events, presentations, or TV interviews without a seconds thought

I don't give my brain time to think or allow my insecurities to manifest to the point they hold me back from incredible opportunities

And guess what!?

John Sacco's Table Scraps: The Chef’s Challenge was EXACTLY that

What an incredibly awesome couple of days that has been burnt & etched into my memory, and will stay with me for the rest of my life

Words cannot describe how immeasurably grateful I am to John and his wonderful wife Monica for inviting us into their beautiful home

John & Monica took hospitality to a whole other level, it was truly mind-blowing how humble and generous you guys are

They invited complete strangers like myself & Antonio in their home and made us feel like part of the family

Not only that, but...

I got the chance to build amazing new friendships & bromances with people a million times smarter and more experienced than me

In just a couple of days, I learnt more about the US Mississippi barge network than I have in 15 years of commodity analytics & research

Eternally grateful to my bro Stuart, my new bud Michael, and the Godfather John Sacco for inviting and welcoming us into their circle

The Lesson:

Don't let your insecurities hold you back

You never know what amazing opportunities you'll miss

“You miss 100% of the shots you don't take”
- Michael Jordan

Introducing the newest addition to the Sierra lineup: the T815 Material Handler.

Engineered for heavy-duty performance, the T815 features our patented Fly-Cab — offering ground-level entry and an impressive 19-foot elevation for unbeatable visibility.

Designed with the operator in mind, the T815 offers:
✔️ 53-foot boom reach
✔️ Automatic and centralized manual greasing systems
✔️ Rear and side infrared cameras with dedicated display
✔️ Load-sensing hydraulic system with electronic power control
✔️ AC/heat climate controls
✔️ Bluetooth radio with cell phone connectivity
✔️ Fuse relay drawer conveniently located under the seat
✔️ No DIN hydraulic fittings or flat O-rings
✔️ Pilot hydraulic joysticks (not electronic)

Built for those who demand more from their equipment — the Sierra T815 is in a class of its own.

Bugün, 6 Şubat depreminin yıl dönümünde, hayatını kaybeden vatandaşlarımızı saygı ve rahmetle anıyor, ailelerine sabır ve dayanma gücü diliyoruz. Bu büyük felaketin acısını yüreğimizde hissederken, dayanışma ve birlik içinde olmanın önemini bir kez daha hatırlıyoruz.

Deprem gerçeğiyle yüzleşmek ve gerekli önlemleri almak, gelecekte benzer acıların yaşanmaması için hayati bir sorumluluktur. Daha güvenli yarınlar için bilinçlenmeye, afetlere karşı hazırlıklı olmaya ve gerekli tedbirleri almaya devam etmeliyiz.

Bugün, sadece kaybettiklerimizi anma günü değil, aynı zamanda ders çıkarıp daha güvenli bir gelecek inşa etme sorumluluğunu hatırlama günüdür.

——————————————————————— 

Today marks the anniversary of the February 6 earthquake, and we remember with respect and compassion those who lost their lives. We extend our deepest condolences to their families and wish them strength and resilience. The pain of this great disaster remains in our hearts, reminding us once again of the importance of unity and solidarity.

Facing the reality of earthquakes and taking necessary precautions is crucial to preventing similar tragedies in the future. We must continue to raise awareness, be prepared for disasters, and take the necessary measures to ensure a safer tomorrow.

Today is not only a day of remembrance for those we lost but also a day to reflect, learn, and commit to building a safer future.

MEET THE BEAST

The Aymas Inclined Shear can process a whopping 70 tonnes of mixed and heavy-duty scrap per hour with continuous feeding.

✂️ No scrap length limit!
✂️ No operator needed!
✂️ Electric or diesel - your choice
✂️ Automatic lubrication & remote diagnostic for easy maintenance
✂️ Chrome-plated shafts and anti-wear plates for long lifespan
✂️ Stationary or semi-mobile
✂️ Reliable cooling system for hot climates (we're looking at you, QLD & NT)

DM us for more info!

🇬🇧 Jebb Metals have now put to work their new Koloss 1000 TS. This Lefort shear/baler is proving to be a real head turner as it sits proudly at the top of their yard. 

💥 Delivered to site in three main pieces the machine is assembled on a foundation frame and commissioned within two weeks. The machine is very productive on all grades of ferrous and non-ferrous metals, shearing with the 1000T window crosshead or baling with the 180T baling ram. 

💪🏽 The power, strength and speed of its cutting is giving very pleasing results for its new owners. This machine, fitted with the 600HP Scania diesel engine, operators control cabin and tunnel pusher ram is easily capable of 25-30 Tonnes per hour of production, depending upon material and cut length. 

We wish Philip & Stephen all the best for the future with their new Lefort Koloss 1000 TS 🙌

💥🎬 [𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨] BORNES RECYCLAGE ramps-up with a new Lidex 1300T !

« Our Lidex can go up to 70t/hr. It has a rail breaker and can handle heavy scrap when needed. In the crane, thanks to the automatic cycle, our operator can prepare the next load while the scrap previously loaded is still being processed. No time is lost ! » Charles Bornes 

M. Bornes also prizes the total cooperation shown throughout the project including the recommendations for the most efficient layout of the machine on site, the supply of the civil engineering guide drawings, the logistic operations, the assembly & commissioning of the machine, not forgetting the training of operators and technicians.

🤝 Thanks again to the Bornes family for their trust.
Wich one would you choose ? 650, 700, 800 or 1000T ? 🤩Wich one would you choose ? 650, 700, 800 or 1000T ? 🤩

Fact Friday: "Patented Innovation" 🧐

Check out our LEFORT® TRAX 650 cutting heavy scrap metal with ease.
The LEFORT® TRAX self-propelled shear/baler, a patented innovation, is designed for unrivaled on-site mobility. With just a single switch on the radio control, the operator can move the entire machine towards the scrap metal pile, eliminating the need to transport scrap to the machine—boosting efficiency and productivity.

LEFORT® TRAX Specifications:
✅ Cutting force: 600-1250T
✅ Hold down force: 120-180T
✅ Box closing force: 2 x 240-350T
✅ Pusher ram force: 180T
✅ Cutting width: 800-940 mm
✅ Box length: 6000-7000 mm
✅ Power: Diesel or electric options available
📩 Contact us for more details!

This week, I had the opportunity to be involved in the commissioning of the LEFORT® TRAX, a cutting-edge machine from one of the world’s leading manufacturers in heavy-duty metal recycling. ♻️ 

This one-of-a-kind machine combines powerful baling and shearing capabilities, making heavy duty scrap processing effortless. What sets it apart is its self-propelled mobility—mounted on tracks and operated with a single remote, it offers unmatched flexibility and efficiency on-site.

Thank you Walter Leijen, our director for this amazing opportunity. Looking forward for upcoming projects!

Below is a picture of me with the Lefort Trax 650.This week, I had the opportunity to be involved in the commissioning of the LEFORT® TRAX, a cutting-edge machine from one of the world’s leading manufacturers in heavy-duty metal recycling. ♻️ 

This one-of-a-kind machine combines powerful baling and shearing capabilities, making heavy duty scrap processing effortless. What sets it apart is its self-propelled mobility—mounted on tracks and operated with a single remote, it offers unmatched flexibility and efficiency on-site.

Below is a picture of me with the Lefort Trax 650.

We recently delivered a 700-ton TRAX shear to William Waugh (Edinburgh) Limited. The arrival of this new shear/baler confirms the company’s commitment for staying at the forefront of technical progress.

The decision to acquire a 700-ton TRAX shear was driven by the need to modernize equipment and meet growing production demands. Alan Waugh  expressed his admiration for the flexibility of the TRAX, movable anywhere on the scrap yard.

With a cutting force of 700 tons and 6.6 m compression box, it is capable of processing large volumes of ferrous and non-ferrous. Each 325-ton press lid, along with a 180-ton pusher, ensures optimal material compression.

This shear is equipped with a 400 HP diesel engine allowing to process up to 20 t/hr and produce over 30 bales/hr.

The acquisition of this new TRAX machine marks a turning point for the company, which combines its family tradition with technological innovations to meet the future challenges of scrap metal recycling.We recently delivered a 700-ton TRAX shear to William Waugh (Edinburgh) Limited. LEFORT®

💡♻️ Comprendre en 3 minutes pourquoi et comment la ferraille est transformée en nouvel acier. 

Grâce à ses machines, LEFORT® se positionne en amont de ce processus, en fournisssant des solutions de traitement des ferrailles afin de les dimensionner et les rendre acceptables par les fours électriques. 

Pour rappel, l’acier est 100% recyclable ! 

Un bel exemple de circularité, pour une industrie trop peu connue 💚Fabriquer de l’acier en recyclant et en polluant BEAUCOUP moins, c’est possible ! 

Je vous fais découvrir de l’intérieur l’usine Ascoval de Valenciennes, où ils fabriquent de l’acier en refondant de la ferraille avec un four électrique. Pour la même quantité d’acier, ce processus émet 10 fois moins de CO2 qu’un haut fourneau classique. 

Dans un haut fourneau, on utilise essentiellement du minerai de fer et du charbon pour fabriquer de l’acier. 

Les seuls hauts fourneaux d’ArcelorMittal (à Fos-sur-Mer et à Dunkerque) représentent à eux seuls 25% des émissions de CO2 industrielles de toute la France ! 

Pour découvrir notre enquête complète sur l’acier, rendez-vous le lundi 14 avril à 21h sur France 5 dans mon #SurLeFront 🫡

Depending on configuration and utilization , Lidex side compression shears can reach very high production levels, up to 115 t/h and productivity gains of 25%.
 
Till now, the Lidex are the only scrap shears with side compression to offer a complete automatic cycle.
 
This unique function is made possible mainly by two major innovations :

✔️innovative kinematics for the preload table which allows dumping of scrap metal directly into the pusher area, and thus reducing the number of movements
 
✔️a high amplitude lid designed to exert exceptional compaction power and efficiency to reduce cycle times.

🎻 C’est une première, le groupe LEFORT® et l’Orchestre Français des Jeunes (OFJ) se rapprochent pour un partenariat peu courant dans l’industrie tout comme dans la musique classique. 

Fawaz Ezzat, Group After Sales Director chez Lefort témoigne  : 

« Le lien ne semble a priori pas évident, mais les similitudes entre l’orchestre et l’industrie sont confondantes. J’ai eu la chance d’intégrer l’OFJ lors des sessions 2006, 2007 et 2008.

Avec du recul, il est évident que l’orchestre m’a apporté énormément en termes de management et de conduite de projet. Être musicien d’orchestre, c’est savoir faire du lien entre les éléments, écouter, s’exprimer, apprendre à gérer son stress, anticiper une échéance, rebondir après un échec. Ces compétences qui deviennent naturelles dans le monde musical, sont également une nécessité dans le monde industriel. »

🔶 Kupferrecycling: Effizient, nachhaltig, unverzichtbar! ♻️

Kupfer ist einer der wertvollsten Rohstoffe in der Metallindustrie – aber wussten Sie, dass recyceltes Kupfer die gleiche Qualität wie Primärkupfer besitzt? Durch effizientes Recycling sparen wir nicht nur Ressourcen, sondern auch bis zu 85 % der Energie, die für die Neugewinnung benötigt wird.

🚀 Unsere Paketierpressen stehen für Nachhaltigkeit!
Um Kupferschrott optimal für die Weiterverarbeitung vorzubereiten, ist eine homogene, kompakte Ballenform entscheidend. Unsere Paketierpressen sorgen für:
✅ Hohe Verdichtung – weniger Volumen, geringere Transport- und Lagerkosten
✅ Optimale Schmelzbarkeit – perfekte Vorbereitung für Hütten und Gießereien
✅ Maximale Effizienz – robust, zuverlässig und für anspruchsvolle Recyclingprozesse ausgelegt

Ob für Kabelschrott, Bleche oder Kupferspäne – unsere Paketierpressen sorgen dafür, dass hochwertiges Kupfer bestmöglich wiederverwertet wird.

📌 Sie wollen Ihr Kupferrecycling optimieren? Kontaktieren Sie uns!

♻️ Recycling von Metallspänen – Nachhaltigkeit beginnt in der Produktion!

Wussten Sie, dass Metallspäne – oft ein Nebenprodukt in der Fertigung – wertvolle Rohstoffe enthalten? Durch effiziente Prozesse können sie nicht nur wiederverwertet, sondern auch zu einem wichtigen Beitrag für die Kreislaufwirtschaft gemacht werden. 🌍🔩

Wie funktioniert der Recyclingprozess?
1️⃣ Spänebrechen: Sperrige, lange Späne werden mit unserem Spänebrecher zerkleinert, sodass sie einfacher zu handhaben sind. Dies reduziert das Volumen und verhindert Probleme wie Verstopfungen in der Weiterverarbeitung.
2️⃣ Brikettierung: Die gebrochenen Späne werden in unseren Brikettierpressen verdichtet.
✅ Das Volumen wird um bis zu 90 % reduziert.
✅ Kühl- und Schmiermittel werden sauber zurückgewonnen.
✅ Es entstehen kompakte, hochwertige Briketts, die sich ideal recyceln lassen.

Warum ist das wichtig?
🌱 Ressourcenschonung: Weniger Abfall, mehr Wiederverwertung.
⚙️ Effizienz: Gebrochene Späne und Briketts sind leichter zu transportieren und zu schmelzen.
💡 Nachhaltige Produktion: Unternehmen sparen Kosten und tragen aktiv zur Kreislaufwirtschaft bei.

Vom ersten Schritt des Spänebrechens bis zum fertigen Brikett – unsere Lösungen helfen, Produktionsabfälle in wertvolle Rohstoffe zu verwandeln.

📌 Erfahren Sie mehr über unsere Technologie und wie sie Ihre Prozesse nachhaltiger gestalten kann. Kontaktieren Sie uns!

#Spänebrechen #Metallrecycling #Brikettierung #Ressourcenschonung #Kreislaufwirtschaft

Rückblick auf die Recy & DepoTech 2024

Letzte Woche hatte ATM Recyclingsystems das Vergnügen, an der Recy & DepoTech 2024 teilzunehmen – einem der wichtigsten Treffpunkte für Recycling- und Ressourcenmanagement. 🌍♻️

Besonders beeindruckt hat uns der Beitrag "Towards closed material cycles in lithium-ion batteries and PV systems: a sustainable resource approach" von Eva Gerold. Diese spannenden Ansätze zur Schließung von Materialkreisläufen sind ein zentraler Baustein für die nachhaltige Zukunft, an der wir gemeinsam arbeiten.

Wir sind stolz auf unsere langjährige Forschungszusammenarbeit mit der Montanuniversität Leoben, Lehrstuhl für Abfallverwertungstechnik und Abfallwirtschaft, die uns ermöglicht, innovative Technologien zu entwickeln und gemeinsam die Herausforderungen der Kreislaufwirtschaft zu meistern.

👉 Ein großes Dankeschön an alle Vortragenden und Teilnehmenden für die inspirierenden Gespräche und neuen Impulse!

✂️ Präzision und Power – Schrottscheren für die Metallverarbeitung! ✂️

Unsere Schrottscheren sind echte Kraftpakete: Sie zerkleinern Metallreste effizient und bringen sie in die optimale Form für Recyclingprozesse und Schmelzanlagen. Ob Stahlträger, Rohre oder Mischschrott – mit unserer Technologie wird Schrottverarbeitung einfacher und wirtschaftlicher. 💪

Warum unsere Schrottscheren?
✔️ Hohe Schneidkraft: Selbst härteste Materialien sind kein Problem
✔️ Effiziente Verarbeitung: Optimale Größe für Lagerung und Transport
✔️ Robuste Bauweise: Zuverlässigkeit auch unter härtesten Bedingungen

Mit unseren Schrottscheren sorgen wir für Effizienz und Nachhaltigkeit in der Schrottwirtschaft – ein unverzichtbares Tool für moderne Metallrecycler. 🌍

👉 Erfahren Sie mehr über unsere ARNO®CUT Schrottscheren:  https://lnkd.in/e7jijgU8

#Schrottscheren #Metallverarbeitung #Recycling #Schrottplatz

📦 Paketieren mit Mehrwert – Effizienz für die Schrottwirtschaft! 📦

Unsere Paketierpressen verwandeln lose Metallschrotte in kompakte, handliche Pakete – ideal für Recyclingbetriebe und Stahlwerke, die Schrott effizient lagern und transportieren wollen. 📦

Was macht unsere Paketiertechnik besonders?

Dank hohem Pressdruck und stabiler Bauweise entstehen feste, platzsparende Pakete, die perfekt für den Weitertransport oder die Schmelze vorbereitet sind. So sparen unsere Kunden nicht nur Platz, sondern auch Zeit und Kosten!

Perfekt geeignet für:
👉 Recyclingunternehmen, die ihre Lagerung optimieren möchten
👉 Stahlwerke und Gießereien für sauberen, geordneten Schrotteinsatz
👉 Alle, die in Logistik und Lagerung von Metallschrott Effizienz suchen

📌 Neugierig auf unsere Technologie? Vereinbaren Sie jetzt einen Termin mit uns und erfahren Sie mehr über die Vorteile unserer Paketierpressen! 📌

#Paketierung #Recycling #Schrottwirtschaft #Effizienz #Schrottplatz

🌍 Effizientes Recycling beginnt bei der Brikettierung 🌍

Unsere Brikettierpressen sind wahre Effizienz-Booster für Recycler, Stahlwerke und Gießereien. Doch wie genau funktioniert die Brikettierung?

💥 Funktionsweise: Die Maschine presst Metallspäne unter hohem Druck zu kompakten Briketts zusammen. So wird das Volumen drastisch reduziert und eine saubere, hochwertige Form geschaffen, die einfach weiterverarbeitet werden kann.

🔍 Vorteile für unsere Kunden:

🔹 Kompakte Briketts: Bis zu 90 % Volumenreduktion sorgt für optimierte Lagerung und Transporteinsparungen.
🔹 Wertvolle Rohstoffrückgewinnung: Durch die Verdichtung wird das Abtropfen von Restölen minimiert – das steigert die Qualität und den Wert des Materials.
🔹 Nachhaltigkeit und Effizienz: Mit weniger Lagerplatz und Transportkosten leisten unsere Pressen einen aktiven Beitrag zu einem umweltfreundlicheren Recyclingprozess.

👉 Mehr erfahren: https://lnkd.in/egNBmVnQ

#Brikettierung #RecyclingTechnologie #Metallrecycling #Nachhaltigkeit #Maschinenbau #Technologie

🚗🔩 Stamping Plants & Scrap Management – A Daily Challenge!

In automotive stamping plants, thousands of tons of steel and aluminum are shaped into body parts every day. But along with precision-formed panels, there’s something else: tons of scrap material. Managing this efficiently is a major challenge.

⚙️ Key challenges in stamping scrap handling:
 ❌ Large material volumes – Scrap accumulates fast and takes up valuable space.
 ❌ Material mix – Separating steel from aluminum is crucial for high-quality recycling.
 ❌ Logistics & transport – Moving bulky scrap efficiently within the plant.

✅ The solution? Smart recycling technology!
 With our briquetting and baling presses, stamping plants can:
 ✔️ Compact scrap to reduce volume and handling costs.
 ✔️ Improve material separation for high-value recycling.
 ✔️ Enhance sustainability by reintegrating materials into production.

By turning waste into value, stamping plants can boost efficiency and contribute to a circular economy. Let’s optimize metal recycling—right where it starts! ♻️

🔥 Kupolschrotte – eine Herausforderung für Recyclingbetriebe?
     Nicht mit der richtigen Technologie! 🔩♻️

In Kupolöfen entstehen metallische Rückstände, die als Kupolschrotte bekannt sind – eine Mischung aus Gusseisen, Stahlschrott und oxidierten Resten. Diese Materialien sind wertvoll, aber ihre sperrige und ungleichmäßige Form macht die Weiterverarbeitung schwierig.

✅ Unsere Lösung:
Unsere Schrottscheren sind mit einer speziellen Funktion für Kupolschrotte ausgestattet – ein Alleinstellungsmerkmal, das den Unterschied macht!

 🔹 Effiziente Zerkleinerung – optimale Vorbereitung für das Recycling
 🔹 Höhere Materialausbeute – mehr Wert aus jedem Schrottteil
 🔹 Weniger Stillstand & Kosten – durch eine gezielte Schneidtechnik

♻️ Effiziente Schrottaufbereitung beginnt mit der richtigen Technologie – lassen Sie uns darüber sprechen! 

#Kupolschrott #Gießerei #Schrottrecycling #Schrottschere

Il settore delle autodemolizioni si trova di fronte a una trasformazione radicale, guidata dall’innovazione tecnologica e dalla ♻️sostenibilità ambientale.

Ecotecnica Europe, leader nel settore, emerge come un fornitore all’avanguardia di presse progettate per integrarsi perfettamente con le nuove esigenze del settore autodemolizioni.

I nostri macchinari, infatti, non solo migliorano l’efficienza operativa, ma contribuiscono a diminuire i consumi energetici in linea con gli obiettivi di sostenibilità propri dell’Industria 5.0.

Leggi l'articolo⬇️

High volume density doesn’t mean higher value—especially in scrap logistics.

In Munich, one of our customers faced this exact issue: hot forming automotive scrap was too thin yet too bulky for efficient handling. Then came Zato Blue Devil—the twin-shaft shredder that downsizes and densifies light steel scrap, optimizes container loads, and reduces logistics costs.

The result? Greater efficiency, lower costs, less waste. Watch the shredder in action and see the difference!

#ZATO #ZatoShredder #RecyclingEquipment #MetalRecycling #BlueDevil

Busheling nearing closer to $500/ton riding the wave as most metals are pushing higher on demand hopes. 

Maybe it’s time to think about how your yard is processing busheling. 

This is Zato most popular application in the US and for good reason. 

Skeleton plates, production clips, coils, tubes, racking, fencing bundles, and lots of other clean iron products fly through our Blue Devil twin shaft. 

With a production cost of only $11/ton and throughput up to 30 tons per hour, this machine is the answer to your question. 

“How can we grow this year?”

Put down a concrete pad and we can install in two weeks.

It's been a busy start to the year for us at Zato and recycling as a whole. 

Two weeks ago, the S&P Global Aluminum Symposium was held in Florida where manufacturers and recyclers alike took part in a massive industry update. 

The most widely held sentiment: the US needs more secondary aluminum smelting.

Arconic expects AI infrastructure for water, energy, and grid maintenance to be a bolstering point for recycled aluminum. Military AND space exploration to be another demand sector.

Alcoa says that with Alumina prices at all time highs, aluminum actually has more demand and is going to benefit.

Bank of America charts show aluminum supply growth has waned the last 4 years while demand for aluminum products has grown significantly. 

Why does this matter to recyclers?

Similar to ferrous markets recently, as melt shops expand into more local US markets, they will need clean, sized, sorted material. Mixed aluminum and non-ferrous goods may keep you alive, but refined, specific grades keeps you growing.

Our job at Zato is easy, keep supplying customers with equipment to create liberated, sized material for sorting. Low quality in, high quality out, under one roof.

Blue Devil Twin Shaft Shredder: debales and pre-shreds full size aluminum scrap.

Blue Marlin Single Shaft Shredder: downsizes extrusions and profiles to screen and sort.

Blue Shark Compact Hammermill: shreds any aluminum material to a uniform size, liberate contaminants, and allow the best sorted product to be made.

Small in size, powerful in performance!

The Blue Shark 12.10 FP combines compactness, reliability, and exceptional efficiency to revolutionise metal recycling. Designed for shredding ferrous and nonferrous materials, it delivers high-purity outputs while ensuring ease of use, low maintenance, and superior durability.

Looking for a smarter, more efficient recycling solution? Discover more about our hammer mill at https://lnkd.in/eyd-ysfE

Your biggest investment is likely not living up to it’s full potential. 

Hammermills are revolutionary to metal recyclers, transforming you from a collection point to a recycling site. 

But is there more you can get out of your hammermill? 
- YES!

4 of our newest customers allowed us to gather data before and after the installation of a Zato Blue Devil. 

Not only was production nearly doubled at every site, but downtime decreased dramatically. 

Why?

It’s pretty simple - bulky material into a shredder is like eating a full head of lettuce, sure you could do it. 

But if you chopped it up into smaller pieces, you could do it a lot faster and without hurting yourself. 

Its the same idea with shred feed. Not only are the pieces smaller, you also remove pressurized containers, or unshreddables.  

Recycle safer. Recycle better. 

Recycled Materials Association (ReMA) Recycling Today #scrap #shredder #zato #steelYour biggest investment is likely not living up to it’s full potential.

We are learning new applications and outlets every month as the market changes. 

And as our product count grows here, so do we. 

Which is why we’ve invested in a new office in Northern Kentucky and grown our employee headcount by 100% this year.

Service and support technicians are here year round now.

SENNEBOGEN und Rothe Erde feiern 66 Jahre erfolgreiche Partnerschaft! Seit 1959 liefert Rothe Erde, einer der führenden Hersteller von Großwälzlagern, hochwertige Wälzlager für die Maschinen von SENNEBOGEN – vom Umschlagbagger bis zum Hafenkran. ⚙️

🗨️ „Die Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit der Komponenten von Rothe Erde bilden seit Jahrzehnten eine verlässliche Basis für unsere innovativen und zuverlässigen Premiumprodukte“, so Erich Sennebogen, Geschäftsführer von SENNEBOGEN.

Zur Jubiläumsfeier wurde ein doppelreihiges Kugellager, das baugleich mit dem ersten gelieferten Modell aus 1959 ist, an das Erich Sennebogen-Museum überreicht. 👏

💡Zum Artikel: https://lnkd.in/endMfxQJ

SENNEBOGEN and Rothe Erde celebrate 66 years of successful collaboration! Since 1959, Rothe Erde, a leading manufacturer of large bearings, has supplied high-quality bearings for SENNEBOGEN machines – from material handlers to harbor cranes. ⚙️

🗨️ "The quality and reliability of Rothe Erde components have formed the foundation of our innovative and reliable premium products for decades," says Erich Sennebogen, CEO of SENNEBOGEN.

To mark the anniversary, a double-row ball bearing, identical to the first one delivered in 1959, was handed over to the Erich Sennebogen Museum. 👏

Infrastructure, bridge, and wind turbine construction – the robust SENNEBOGEN 6203 E handles even the heaviest precast elements and components.  It's suitable for pick-and-carry operation and tasks on uneven construction sites, enabling working at angles of up to 4°. 🚧

Introducing our new SENcon control system: Smart, more intuitive, future-ready! Designed for operators, fleet managers, and service technicians, SENcon ensures maximum efficiency, safety, and ease of use with a range of powerful features:

🕹️ Customizable Driver Profiles: Adjust joystick settings and machine parameters for personalized comfort and precision.
💡 Intelligent Assistance Systems: Features like the Virtual Wall and load weighing increase accuracy and safety.
📊 Real-time Machine Monitoring: Get instant insights into machine performance and live diagnostics for optimal efficiency.
🔧 Remote Service Support: Diagnose issues remotely, minimize downtime, and ensure fast, targeted maintenance.
🔄 Wireless Over-the-air Software Updates: Always up to date, no on-site visits needed.
✅ Seamless Fleet Integration: Connect with SENtrack telematics system to optimize performance, maintenance, and energy efficiency.

𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 & 𝗗𝗘𝗨𝗧𝗭: 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗴 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗻𝘂𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘄💪🚜
Bavarian machines and Cologne engines – a success story for over 70 years! 🤝
Since the 1950s, SENNEBOGEN has relied on the reliable engines from DEUTZ AG. Over the years, this partnership has grown steadily, and today DEUTZ engines power numerous SENNEBOGEN machines around the world. 🌍
🌱 This long-standing partnership is now being further strengthened: In addition to the integration of DEUTZ diesel engines in selected SENNEBOGEN models, the focus of the collaboration will also be on alternative drive concepts. Battery-electric and hydrogen-based drives offer a sustainable option for the future. 🔋
💬 "We see many positive synergies in an intensified collaboration. Especially in the off-highway application, we can jointly develop new, forward-looking solutions", says managing director Erich Sennebogen.
💡 Learn more in our press release: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4jStDAA

𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 & 𝗗𝗘𝗨𝗧𝗭: 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗳𝘁 𝘄𝗶𝗿𝗱 𝘄𝗲𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝘂𝘀𝗴𝗲𝗯𝗮𝘂𝘁💪🚜
Bayerische Maschinen und Kölner Motoren – eine Erfolgsgeschichte seit über 70 Jahren! 🤝 
Schon in den 1950er Jahren vertraute SENNEBOGEN auf die zuverlässigen Motoren von DEUTZ AG. Seither wurde die Zusammenarbeit stetig ausgebaut, sodass heute DEUTZ-Motoren in zahlreichen SENNEBOGEN Maschinen rund um die Welt im Einsatz sind. 🌍
🌱Diese langjährige Partnerschaft wird nun weiter vertieft: Neben dem Einbau von DEUTZ Dieselmotoren in ausgewählten SENNEBOGEN Modellen wird ein Fokus der Zusammenarbeit auch auf alternativen Antriebkonzepten liegen. Batterieelektrische und wasserstoffbasierte Antriebe bieten eine nachhaltige Option für die Zukunft. 🔋 
💬 „Wir sehen viele positive Synergien in einer intensiveren Zusammenarbeit. Gerade in der Off-Highway-Anwendung können wir zusammen neue, zukunftsweisende Lösungen realisieren,“ so Geschäftsführer Erich Sennebogen.
💡Mehr in der Pressemeldung: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Xi0Zzh

The SENNEBOGEN 355 E Telehandler of the Donau-Wald waste management association delivers exceptional performance at the Passau-Hellersberg disposal center! ✅ Under tight schedules, working 4–5 hours a day, it handles paper and bulky household waste and loads it into trucks.
👷Werner Reh operates the 355 E on a daily basis and reports: "We are very happy with the vehicle!"

Why it stands out:
🚛 Elevating cab: Operators benefit from an optimal view over the work environment and can look into the loading trucks.
💪 High-capacity hold-down bucket: The attachment is ideal for efficiently handling loose waste material with its high filling volume of up to 1,400 kg/m³.
🛠️ Reliable SENNEBOGEN service: 💬 "There was always someone available or even on-site if there was a problem."

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗖𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗹 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴: 𝟰𝟬 𝗬𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗣𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗯𝗲𝘁𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗔𝗕𝗜 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 & 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 👏
In 1984, a success story began when SENNEBOGEN and ABI Gruppe joined forces to create innovative solutions for special civil engineering applications. 🏗️ 
Over the past 40 years, this collaboration has shaped the market, delivering customized, efficient machinery that sets global standards in the special civil engineering sector. 
💬 "The number of solutions we have implemented together speaks for the great success of this partnership. We have extensive expertise in building base machines, while ABI is an expert in special civil engineering applications. Together, we provide customers with market-leading solutions in the special civil engineering sector," emphasized managing director Erich Sennebogen during the anniversary celebration. 
🤝 Both companies are looking to the future with confidence, ready to tackle new challenges and opportunities together. 
Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4h4OC15

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝘇𝗶𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗲𝗳𝗯𝗮𝘂: 𝟰𝟬 𝗝𝗮𝗵𝗿𝗲 𝗣𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗳𝘁 𝘇𝘄𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗻 𝗔𝗕𝗜 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝘂𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 👏
Im Jahr 1984 begann eine Erfolgsgeschichte, als SENNEBOGEN und die ABI Gruppe ihre Kräfte bündelten, um innovative Lösungen für Anwendungen im Spezialtiefbau zu schaffen. 🏗️ 
In den vergangenen 40 Jahren hat diese Zusammenarbeit den Markt geprägt und kundenorientierte, effiziente Maschinen geliefert, die weltweit Maßstäbe im Spezialtiefbau setzen.
💬 „Die Anzahl der Lösungen, die wir gemeinsam realisiert haben, zeugt vom großen Erfolg dieser Konstellation. Wir verstehen viel vom Bau von Trägergeräten, ABI ist ein Experte für die Spezialtiefbauanwendung. Zusammen bieten wir den Kunden heute marktführende Lösungen im Spezialtiefbau an“, betonte Geschäftsführer Erich Sennebogen anlässlich der Jubiläumsfeier.
🤝 Beide Unternehmen blicken zuversichtlich in die Zukunft und sind bereit, neue Herausforderungen und Chancen gemeinsam anzugehen.

In 1984, a success story began when SENNEBOGEN and ABI Gruppe joined forces to create innovative solutions for special civil engineering applications. 🏗️ 
Over the past 40 years, this collaboration has shaped the market, delivering customized, efficient machinery that sets global standards in the special civil engineering sector. 
💬 "The number of solutions we have implemented together speaks for the great success of this partnership. We have extensive expertise in building base machines, while ABI is an expert in special civil engineering applications. 🤝 Both companies are looking to the future with confidence, ready to tackle new challenges and opportunities together.

Our recent shipment of eight large SENNEBOGEN machines from Straubing to South Carolina via eco-friendly waterway marks another step toward sustainable logistics at SENNEBOGEN. 🍃

A total of 700 tons of machinery was loaded onto barges at the port of Straubing. 🚢 Among them were the powerful SENNEBOGEN 855 and 870 material handlers, weighing between 70 and 105 tons. The complex loading process involved precise tandem lifts, performed with a SENNEBOGEN 5500 E Crawler Crane, working in tandem with another crane.

The machines are now traveling via inland and ocean vessels to their final destination in Charleston, South Carolina. 🇺🇸 This water route cuts CO₂ emissions by 75%, saving 49 tons compared to road transport. ✅

Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3WvwUeZ

RESAG Recycling und Sortierwerk Bern AG has elevated their operations with a new electric SENNEBOGEN 830 E. ♻️ Powered by an efficient 132 kW electric engine, the machine ensures a quiet, low-vibration, and emission-free environment – ideal for indoor operations. 🔇

💬 "In the closed hall, this is particularly important for a pleasant and healthy working environment for our employees," explains René Schneider, Managing Director.

Delivered by Kuhn Schweiz AG, the material handler is mounted on a customized rail undercarriage. 🛤️ Its curved "banana" attachment provides an extended reach for waste sorting and loading tasks.

In addition to the 830 E, the sorting plant uses a mobile SENNEBOGEN 825 E, which mainly supports the company in wood processing - the purchase of a second model is already being planned.

💡Read the full jobsite report: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3C0g2WS

Restoration of historic SENNEBOGEN machines - former apprentice project with a success story 🔧
Our employees Andreas and Alois started their career at SENNEBOGEN with an extraordinary project: the restoration of historical machines for the opening of the Erich Sennebogen Museum in 2014. ✨ 
One of these machines was a SENNEBOGEN S 802 rope excavator, in production between 1958 and 1960. After so many decades, the wear and tear of time had taken a heavy toll on the machine, which had to be dismantled and painstakingly restored. Alongside other historical models, all restored to their former glory, it is a witness to the development of mechanical engineering in our company's history. 👏
Ten years after the museum opened, Andreas and Alois are still part of our team and have made impressive careers since then. 🚀
💡Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

Restaurierung historischer SENNEBOGEN Maschinen - ehemaliges Azubiprojekt mit Erfolgsgeschichte 🔧
Unsere Mitarbeiter Andreas und Alois starteten ihre Karriere bei SENNEBOGEN mit einem außergewöhnlichen Projekt: der Restaurierung historischer Maschinen zur Eröffnung des Erich Sennebogen Museums um 2014. ✨ 
Eine dieser Maschinen war ein SENNEBOGEN S 802 Seilbagger, in Produktion zwischen 1958 und 1960. Nach so vielen Jahrzehnten hatte der Zahn der Zeit stark an der Maschine genagt, welche  zerlegt und in mühevoller Detailarbeit restauriert werden musste. Im Museum in Straubing zeugt sie seit der Aufbereitung in neuer Pracht neben anderen historischen Modellen von der Entwicklung des Maschinenbaus in der Unternehmensgeschichte. 👏
Auch Andreas und Alois sind zehn Jahre nach Museumseröffnung immer noch Teil unseres Teams und haben seitdem beeindruckende Karrieren gemacht. 🚀
💡Lies hier mehr: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

Kürzlich haben wir bei SENNEBOGEN wieder unsere Absolventen für ihren erfolgreichen Ausbildungsabschluss gefeiert. Gemeinsam mit der Geschäftsleitung und den Familien würdigten wir diesen besonderen Meilenstein bei einer feierlichen Zeremonie. 👏💚
Unsere Nachwuchskräfte sind essenziell für den langfristigen Erfolg von SENNEBOGEN – deshalb investieren wir stark in die Ausbildung. Und das zahlt sich aus:
𝗔𝗹𝗹𝗲 𝗔𝗯𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻 𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗶𝗯𝗲𝗻 𝗮𝗻 𝗕𝗼𝗿𝗱 und starten nun als festangestellte Fachkräfte ins Berufsleben – von IT und Lagerlogistik bis hin zu gewerblichen Berufen wie Industrie- oder Feinwerkmechaniker.
💬 „Das zeigt, dass wir ein attraktiver Arbeitgeber sind und unseren Nachwuchskräften langfristige Perspektiven bieten können“, so Thorsten Resch aus der Geschäftsleitung.

💡 Hier weiterlesen: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4iEamS3

______

𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱𝘂𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗸𝗶𝗰𝗸-𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗶𝗿 𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘆 🚀🎓

Recently, we celebrated our graduates for successfully completing their apprenticeships. Together with the management and their families, we honored this important milestone at a festive ceremony. 👏💚
Our young talents are essential to SENNEBOGEN’s long-term success – that’s why we invest heavily in training. And it pays off:
𝗔𝗹𝗹 𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗱𝘂𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 with us and starting their careers as full-time professionals – from IT and logistics to technical fields such as industrial or precision mechanics.
💬 “This proves that we are an attractive employer and can offer our young professionals long-term career prospects,” says Thorsten Resch, managing director.

💡 Continue reading: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4iD2Xm6

🌍 Steel production alone is responsible for 7% of global CO₂ emissions❗

At SENNEBOGEN, we are committed to sustainability – not only through energy-efficient machine solutions, but also by using more sustainable materials. That’s why we now offer machines built with green steel – and by "green," we don’t just mean our signature color. 🟢

🍃 "Green steel" refers to CO₂-reduced, more sustainable steel production, which we can offer now in partnership with Salzgitter AG and its subsidiary Deumu Deutsche Erz- Und Metall-Union GmbH. Compared to conventional steel production, this enables CO₂ savings of more than 70%.

Our very first green steel machine is one of our newly launched 40 t SENNEBOGEN 830 G material handlers, a model already known for its exceptional efficiency. With green steel we are cutting up to 20 tons CO₂ emission per machine.

SENNEBOGEN now offers comprehensive implementation of this option for all models on request.
💡 Learn more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4jcIOTT

🔜 See the first "double green" 830 G live at bauma Munich 2025, April 9-13!
📍 SENNEBOGEN booth, outdoor area FM.712
➡️ https://lnkd.in/eh7YATsp

No joke: SENNEBOGEN is expanding its battery-powered material handler lineup The 824 G and 826 G Electro Battery are joining our latest G-series machine generation. 🆕

🍃 Zero Emissions, maximum savings: Over 60 tons CO₂ can be saved per year while operating and maintenance costs are also lower.
🔋 Flexible modular battery concept: Up to four powerful lithium-ion battery packs can be configured or retrofitted with approx. 98 kWh each.
🕖 When equipped with 4 battery packs, each can be used for 6 to 7 hours without recharging. 
⚡ Dual power mode: You can also keep working while the machine is plugged into the grid for recharging.

💡Learn more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4iT3dxI

Nuova cabina 2024:
-   Design moderno
- Maggior sicurezza (questa cabina è molto più solida e le griglie protettive superiori e frontali sono più robuste rispetto alla precedente)
- Comfort (cabina più grande come abitacolo, visibilità lato destro aumentata, climatizzatore con potenza doppia rispetto alla precedente)
- Sistema di filtraggio aria ottimizzato (doppio filtro)
- Display touch screen 7”
- Estintore in cabina
- Nuovo cruscotto con porta telefono, porta bottiglie e vasca porta oggetti dietro al sedile che permette di mettere un piccolo frigo
- Cambio filtro aria esterna e rabbocco liquido tergi cristalli molto agevole aprendo la portellina in ABS
- Griglia anteriore e superiore sono apribili per consentire la pulizia dei vetri
- Assistenza remota
 
New Cab 2024: 
- Modern design:
- Better security: the front and upper protective grilles have been reinforced, providing additional protection for the operator
- Enhanced comfort: the cockpit is more spacious; side visibility, particularly on the right side, has been improved; air conditioning system has doubled its power.
- Optimised air filter system: improved by adding a double filter.
- 7-inch touch screen display:
- Cab fire extinguisher
- New multifunctional dashboard with a telephone holder, a bottle holder and a storage tub located behind the seat, that can also be used to store a refrigerator
- Ease of maintenance:** easily allows access to components without having to remove parts of the cab.
- Accessibility for window cleaning:** Both the front and top grille are designed to be openable.
- Remote assistance
 #tabarelli #materialhandler #recycling #newcab

Bronneberg B.V. is een begrip in de markt. Schrootverwerkers spreken vaak met liefde over hun eerste Bronneberg schaar dan wel pers. Ze veroorzaakten decennia geleden al een kleine revolutie in de branche, en doen dat nog steeds. Achter iedere Bronneberg machine zit namelijk een gedachte, want die is altijd nét wat efficiënter, sneller of slimmer dan een machine van een ‘vreemd’ merk. 

“We investeren in de persoonlijke ontwikkeling van onze medewerkers en zorgen ervoor dat iedereen zich onderdeel voelt van de Bronneberg familie”, vertelt Michiel J..

Ontdek het volledige gesprek via https://lnkd.in/e-rDM6wq
 
📷 Henri Jegerings , Robbert-Jan Jegerings, Alexander Jegerings, Michiel J.

📢 Last week, the #REEPRODUCE consortium met at Bronneberg B.V. 👏 

The consortium engaged in productive discussions around key objectives, strategies and next steps to ensure the success of our collaborative efforts🤝

During the first half of the project, significant progress has been made in advancing recycling technologies for devices containing Neodymium (Nd) magnets. The #REEPRODUCE consortium initiated demonstration phases, focusing on validating innovative recycling processes across multiple facilities in Europe. At this stage the consortium has successfully constructed five pilots (TRL7) and carried out demonstration trials in two of them, marking a significant step forward in achieving the project’s objective.

The partners had the opportunity to visit Bronneberg B.V.'s facilities to explore the innovative pilots that FAU Erlangen-Nürnberg (Institute FAPS) and Bronneberg have developed to extract Nd-based magnets blocks from different components of selected end-of-life products, with validation planned for early 2025.

Exciting times ahead as we work together to drive innovation and deliver impactful results❗ ♻️🌍

Don’t miss out—give us a follow and help spread the word 📢 

💻Visit our website: https://www.reeproduce.eu/
📰Subscribe to our newsletter: https://lnkd.in/eUn93-xd

Meet the consortium 🤝 https://lnkd.in/exXnDuvy

At Bronneberg, we’re thrilled to announce our partnership with Dutch Magnetics B.V., bringing magnetic solutions to the recycling industry. Together, we’re making it easier for businesses to achieve cleaner, more efficient recycling processes.

Here’s how Dutch Magnetics' state-of-the-art technology is elevating recycling:
🔹 𝗘𝗱𝗱𝘆 𝗖𝘂𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 for separating non-ferrous metals with precision.
🔹 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗻𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗗𝗿𝘂𝗺 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹𝘀 to simplify material handling and sorting.
🔹 𝗢𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗯𝗲𝗹𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗻𝗲𝘁𝘀 to separate ferrous from non-ferrous metals.
🔹 And more

Have a look at their website for more information: https://lnkd.in/endzY-D7

🌞 Discover FOR REC's solutions to recycle photovoltaic panels! 

As solar energy increases, so does the need for efficient handling of end-of-life photovoltaic panels.
FOR REC meets this need with tailor-made plants designed to ensure optimal separation of components and reduce processing times.

Main features of the FOR REC plants:
✔ Full panel treatment: our lines accept whole solar panels, setting up an efficient separation process;
✔Material separation: we recover aluminium from frames, magnetic metals, inert fraction, ethylene vinyl acetate and non-magnetic metals from harnesses and connectors.
✔ High production capacity: our plants process up to 6 tonnes/hour thanks to advanced hydraulic grinders and separation systems.

Discover our cutting-edge solutions for photovoltaic panel recycling 👉 https://lnkd.in/d_NHvAPe

🌍 Expanding Recycling Solutions in India! 🇮🇳
Forrec is excited to contribute to sustainable growth in India, where the emphasis on a circular economy is stronger than ever. By providing advanced systems for End-of-Life Tyre (ELT) recycling, Forrec supports the Indian market in its journey toward environmental sustainability.
Our solutions are tailored to address the growing demand for efficient recycling technologies in a market poised for transformation under initiatives like Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR). Together, we can make recycling not just a necessity but an opportunity for innovation and growth.
Discover how Forrec is shaping the future of recycling globally.

En Novacero, estamos comprometidos con construir un futuro más sostenible para Ecuador y el mundo.

Con la reciente inauguración de nuestra Planta Recuperadora de Residuos, estamos dando un paso significativo en esa dirección.
Esta planta, que transforma residuos en materia prima útil para diversas industrias, representa nuestra firme apuesta por la transformación sostenible.

Al evitar que más de 12 mil toneladas anuales de desechos se conviertan en basura, estamos contribuyendo activamente a la reducción de la contaminación y al cuidado del medio ambiente.

Nuestro compromiso ambiental es un pilar fundamental en todas nuestras operaciones, y esta planta es un claro ejemplo de ello.

Juntos, estamos construyendo un futuro más limpio y próspero. 💚🌍

♻️ Turning waste into assets: the value of industrial recycling!

Every day, thousands of tonnes of potentially recoverable materials become industrial waste.
What if we turned this waste into new opportunities?

FOR REC designs and develops innovative plants for the treatment of plastic, aluminium, photovoltaic panels, WEEE and more, converting waste into valuable raw materials.
Choosing industrial recycling means:
✅ Reducing environmental impact;
✅ Optimise production costs;
✅ Making a concrete contribution to the circular economy.

With FOR REC plants you can upgrade your industrial waste, giving it a second life. Find out how to turn your waste into valuable resources ➡️ https://lnkd.in/dMu_Fevj

♻️ MSW: from urban waste to new value with FOR REC!

Did you know that it is possible to recover many valuable raw materials from Municipal Solid Waste (MSW)?
With the FOR REC recycling lines you can valorise waste materials into a concrete opportunity for your company! How?
Our recycling lines are designed to recover raw materials, while the non-recyclable dry fraction can be processed to produce Residual Derived Fuel (RDF).
🚀 A unique way to generate additional value from material destined for disposal!

📌 Come and discover all FOR REC solutions at the RESIDUOS EXPO! We look forward to seeing you in Mexico City from 25 to 27 March.

♻️ Refrigerators and boilers: complex waste, smart solutions!

Recycling refrigerators and boilers is no simple task. These appliances contain insulating gases, plastics, metals, and other components that require precision and safety during treatment.

At FOR REC, we’ve developed turnkey systems capable of handling the complexity of these materials. Our technologies ensure:
✅ Safe removal of harmful substances;
✅ Efficient separation of metals, plastics, and polyurethane;
✅ Compliance with international environmental standards.

Whether you’re facing the challenges of WEEE regulations or looking to improve your plant’s performance, FOR REC provides customized and scalable solutions to make refrigerator and boiler recycling cleaner, safer, and more efficient.

Discover more about our specialized systems: https://lnkd.in/dF2S5DkF

The Moselle, with a length of 544 km the second longest tributary of the Rhine, plays a decisive role as an international waterway. 28 barrages enable inland waterway vessels to make smooth progress. 

However, the failure of a lock, as in December 2024, represents a significant disruption to inland traffic. In order to act quickly and efficiently in this critical situation, the Mosel-Saar-Lahn Waterways and Shipping Authority (WSA) has had a framework agreement with the Trier-based crane rental expert Steil Kranarbeiten GmbH & Co. KG for years. 

Thanks to this cooperation and state-of-the-art #Liebherr technology, the damaged gate could be salvaged and a new one installed. In the meantime, our mobile crane played the main role in the emergency lock-out of 74 ships stuck on the Moselle.

👉 Read more here: https://lnkd.in/ekDVtsYkThe Moselle, with a length of 544 km the second longest tributary of the Rhine, plays a decisive role as an international waterway. 28 barrages enable inland waterway vessels to make smooth progress.

An unbeatable team: LRH 200 unplugged 🤝 DHR 110 #DownTheHoleDrilling 

1️⃣ Precision & Straightness: DTH drilling provides excellent hole straightness and accuracy, which is crucial for foundation work and blasting applications.
2️⃣ Efficiency in Hard Rock: The method is highly effective in hard rock formations, where other drilling techniques may struggle.
3️⃣ Minimal Energy Loss: The hammer is located at the bottom, reducing energy loss compared to top hammer drilling.
4️⃣ Versatile Applications: Suitable for foundation piling, well drilling, mining, and quarrying.

Focus on wheel loaders: legendary paint styles to enhance any construction site! 🎨

Anyone who thinks that #Liebherr wheel loaders are only available in classic yellow, is not aware that we offer customised solutions.

In December 2024, Liebherr-Australia proudly delivered our 700th bucket—a 37.5m³ R9600 backhoe bucket for a valued customer.

Since 1995, we’ve supported Australia’s mining industry with high-quality buckets built for tough conditions. In just the last five years, we’ve delivered 196 buckets, including a record-breaking 49 in 2024!

This milestone is thanks to our 60+ skilled employees, whose craftsmanship ensures Liebherr buckets are trusted for quality and performance.

Thank you to our customers, partners, and employees for making this possible. Here’s to an even bigger 2025!

ℹ️ Vertical Line Finder – lifting without diagonal pull!

Our Vertical Line Finder supports the crane operator with the lifting of loads by preventing diagonal pull, and therefore sway, when lifting. 

The crane automatically controls the slewing gear and trolley to ensure that the load hook is always optimally positioned above the load’s centre of gravity. 🏗️

As a result, the load is always lifted vertically, without any sway, which increases safety for people and sensitive components on site. 

This assistance system is now available for our new K-series and L-series.

More information: https://lnkd.in/eSkSV5gu

#liebherr #towercranes #construction #assistancesystems #liebherrgroup

Exciting news from Liebherr Maritime Cranes!  🎉 

A milestone worth celebrating as the Rostock team mark the production of the 2,000th mobile harbour crane! This special edition LHM 600 will be delivered to Marcegaglia in Ravenna, Italy.

Its slewing platform features a unique design, blending engineering precision with regional aesthetics. The two-sided motif includes an Italian side with an Italian inscription and one of Ravenna’s famous landmarks – the Basilica di Sant'Apollinare Nuovo. The German side features a lighthouse and German text, reflecting on the industrial and maritime heritage of the crane’s Rostock origins. Both sides include dock workers and symbolise the history and collaboration between #Liebherr Rostock and #Marcegaglia.

In #Ravenna, the LHM 600 will handle steel products, including coils, sheets, and strips, effortlessly switching between containers, general cargo, and bulk materials. And it will do so in style!

📜 Read more about this historic achievement: 
https://lnkd.in/ezc-VyCp

Big cheers to innovation! 🎉

Not one, not two, but three Liebherr technologies were in the running for the Innovation Award — including our intelligent assistance system “Positioning Pilot” and the S1 Vision single-axle haulage solution. 🏅
In the end, it was “Liebherr Autonomous Operations” that stole the spotlight, winning in the “Digitalisation” category! 💡🏆

The autonomous system for wheel loaders is the result of years of hard work and intensive development. With the help of this system, repetitive and monotonous tasks of a wheel loader can be performed easily and intuitively without the help of a human operator. This not only enhances productivity but also frees up operators to focus on more complex and dynamic responsibilities.

For more information about the award ceremony visit:
https://lnkd.in/eDrzUqHK

Huge congratulations to the amazing team at Liebherr-Werk Bischofshofen for this well-earned recognition! 👏🙌

🔋 Efficient, compact, and locally emission-free – the new LBX 600 unplugged!

At #bauma2025, we will present the new carrier machine for diaphragm wall applications – now available with battery-electric drive. 

Its compact design and modular boom system offer maximum flexibility, even on confined job sites. Three boom configurations – Standard, Low Head, and Ultra Low Head – allow operations at various heights. 

Additionally, the LBX 600 unplugged stands out with zero local emissions and reduced noise levels, making it ideal for work in sensitive environments.

Experience the future of diaphragm wall technology in Munich!

Many thanks to our customer Jan De Nul Group for the pictures!

The new LR 1300.2 SX unplugged – The future of lifting! Join us in celebrating 18 years of the LR 1300 crawler crane. 🎉🥳

Innovation meets sustainability: The LR 1300.2 SX unplugged is the world’s first 300-tonne battery-powered crawler crane. With up to 56% reduced ground pressure thanks to the patented ground pressure reduction system, it minimises impact on surfaces. The VarioTray system simplifies ballast handling, saving valuable setup time.

Maximum operator comfort: A premium orthopaedic seat with climate-controlled ventilation, a dimmable sunshade- and improved cabin access ensure a superior working environment. Enhanced transport and securing options make it ideal for floating structures. For demanding foundation work, three new pile tilting devices enable efficient piling.

Discover the LR 1300.2 SX unplugged at bauma 2025 and experience cutting-edge lifting technology!

Successful together! 

Time to say goodbye - how? With the traditional sounding of horns! But the 7th episode of the Bauma video magazine includes much more: new machines, insights into an important partnership and a look back at the year 2024.

Tune in now!

#bauma2025 #handsonliebherr

Bauma 2025 is coming to an end! 

‘Hands on the future.’ This is more than just our motto for this year's Bauma. It neatly captures the attitude of the Group as a whole: for months, our employees worked all hands on deck to get up and running for the exhibition and to show everyone how we plan to approach the future – namely hand in hand with its customers and partners.

This afternoon, we all gathered to mark the end of a truly successful exhibition week, traditionally by sounding the horns. But this isn’t goodbye, of course, just ‘Auf Wiedersehen’! 

Many thanks to everyone who was there with us - see you next time in 2028! 💛

More details: https://lnkd.in/eBP4drpc

#bauma2025 #handsonliebherr

A lot has changed since Bauma began in 1954. 

We participated as one of the largest exhibitors at the second official Bauma in 1956. A few years later, in 1983, Klaus Eckert, now Head of Sales Promotion at Liebherr-Mischtechnik GmbH, was able to witness the construction of the our booth for the first time with his father. 

Since that he has been eight times at the Bauma with Liebherr. 

Here Klaus Eckert is taking a look back on his first Bauma experience and tells us all about how the exhibition has developed over the years. 

More information: https://lnkd.in/ev4UtUYS
